item.title: ‘I have an economics degree from a fantastic university’: I’m 71 with $3 million and earn $250K. Is it time to retire?
item.description: “I have a home worth $1.2 million and owe $300,000 at 3% interest.”

item.title: Jeff Bridges lists empty Malibu lot for $4.4 million where family home burned down in wildfire
item.description: Acting icon Jeff Bridges has put his family’s longtime Malibu, Calif., property on the market—after the home that once stood on the now-bare parcel of...

item.title: ‘I still have a mortgage’: I’m no longer confident that my costs will actually fall in retirement. What can I do?
item.description: “I think my withdrawals from my 401(k) and IRA may need to be larger than my current take-home pay.”

item.title: ‘I will soon turn 65’: My son wants to live in my investment property for less than market rent. Do I say yes?
Ellen DeGeneres jumps back into U.S. real estate, buying a $27.4 SoCal mansion
